item.content:encoded:
Hi friends in this video I will show you how to easily propagate Ixora plant from cuttings. I will share with you the details about each step and the current status after 1 Month.

  • 3:38 Rooting Hormone Application
  • 4:24 Adding Humidity Dome
  • 6:06 Sunlight Requirement and Time Required
  • 7:56 Cutting Update After 1 Month

item.content:encoded:

item.title: DIY Durable UV Resistant Plastic Pot
item.dc:creator: neilmahaseth
item.description:
In this DIY project, I will show you how I converted a normal plastic container into a UV Resistant Plastic Pot. The materials used for this project are cheap and...

The post DIY Durable UV Resistant Plastic Pot appeared first on Plants My Love.
item.content:encoded:
In this DIY project, I will show you how I converted a normal plastic container into a UV Resistant Plastic Pot. The materials used for this project are cheap and easily available.

▼ Materials @ Used ▼

  • Plastic Container
  • Aluminum Foil
  • Cello Tape
  • Metal Rod

I hope friends, you liked this video guide on DIY Durable UV Resistant Plastic Pot. If yes, don’t forget to share this video with your friends and family whom you think could benefit from it. item.content:encoded:
In this DIY project, I will show you how I prevent water damage/ seepage in my terrace garden. The materials used for this project are cheap and easily available. So you can easily implement it in your terrace garden.

I hope friends, you liked this video guide on how to prevent water seepage in the terrace garden.
